mapper.select: SELECT A.DOC_ID, C.DOC_TITLE, C.DOC_NO, C.REG_DATE, C.SECURE_LEVEL, A.EMP_NO AS WAIT_EMP_NO, B.EMP_NAME AS WAIT_EMP_NAME, C.EMP_NO AS WRITER_EMP_NO, D.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_EMP_NAME FROM DOCUMENTDETAIL A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO INNER JOIN DOCUMENTS C ON A.DOC_ID = C.DOC_ID INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES D ON C.EMP_NO = D.EMP_NO WHERE A.APPROVAL_ORDER = (SELECT MIN(APPROVAL_ORDER) FROM DOCUMENTDETAIL WHERE APPROVAL_DATE IS NULL AND STATUS = 'WAIT' AND DOC_ID = A.DOC_ID ) AND C.RETURN_EMP_NO IS NULL AND A.EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT DISTINCT DOC_ID, DOC_NO, DOC_TITLE, TO_CHAR(DONE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH12:MI:SS') AS DONE_DATE, WRITER_EMP_NAME, SECURE_LEVEL FROM ( SELECT A.DOC_ID, A.DOC_NO, A.DOC_TITLE, A.DONE_DATE, A.SECURE_LEVEL, C.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_EMP_NAME, B.EMP_NO, CASE A.SECURE_LEVEL WHEN 'C' THEN 'D' WHEN 'B' THEN 'C' WHEN 'A' THEN 'B' WHEN 'S' THEN 'A' END AS S_LEVEL FROM DOCUMENTS A INNER JOIN DOCUMENTDETAIL B ON A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES C ON A.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO WHERE A.DONE_DATE IS NOT NULL ) WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} OR S_LEVEL >= ( SELECT CASE WHEN POSITION = 0 THEN 'D' WHEN POSITION = 1 THEN 'C' WHEN POSITION >= 2 AND POSITION < 4 THEN 'B' WHEN POSITION >= 4 THEN 'A' END AS P_LEVEL FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}) ORDER BY DONE_DATE

SELECT A.DOC_ID, A.DOC_NO, A.DOC_TITLE, A.REG_DATE, A.SECURE_LEVEL, A.EMP_NO AS WRITER_EMP_NO, C.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_EMP_NAME, A.RETURN_EMP_NO AS RETURN_EMP_NO, B.EMP_NAME AS RETURN_EMP_NAME FROM DOCUMENTS A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES B ON A.RETURN_EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES C ON A.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO WHERE RETURN_EMP_NO IS NOT NULL AND A.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY A.DOC_ID

SELECT A.DOC_ID, A.DOC_NO, A.DOC_TITLE, A.EMP_NO AS WRITER_EMP_NO, B.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_EMP_NAME, CASE WHEN RETURN_EMP_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '반려됨' ELSE '진행중' END AS STATE, A.REG_DATE, A.SECURE_LEVEL FROM DOCUMENTS A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO INNER JOIN DOCUMENTDETAIL C ON A.DOC_ID = C.DOC_ID WHERE A.DONE_DATE IS NULL AND C.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY A.DOC_ID, C.APPROVAL_ORDER

SELECT A.DOC_ID, A.DOC_NO, A.DOC_TITLE, A.EMP_NO AS WRITER_EMP_NO, B.EMP_NAME AS WRITER_EMP_NAME, A.REG_DATE FROM DOCUMENTS A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO WHERE A.TEMP_YN = '1' AND A.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY A.DOC_ID
